name: Shush (Jon_gretar)
description:
Welcome to Shush! the game where anything is possible. This game is a school project made by Jón Grétar Guðjónsson it is still just a prototype. Shush is a black-clothed goon running around the streets of ShushLand he only wears hypebeast clothing and you need to help him get the star.

the controls for this game are

space-jump

d-right

a-left
